name: words
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool jibber_jabber.
Tool description: Dummy Text Generator
API description: Generates and returns random words based on specified criteria using the Jibber-Jabber API.

minimumwordlength.description: Minimum length of the words to generate. Defaults to None.

maximumwordlength.description: Maximum length of the words to generate. Defaults to None.

numberofwords.description: Number of words to generate. Defaults to None.

wordlength.description: Minimum length of the words to generate. Defaults to None.
